title: Allow to open local files from Command Line
body: Allow to open local files from the command line when Edge is not the default browser.

comments.body: MadCap Flare users: consider switching from the Tripane template to the Top Navigation template.   This template does not use fragments nor queries to address a specific topic.
We need this feature urgently for contextual HTML5 help Projects for customer Software.
There is no file protocol implemented for Edge. This would be too easy, so we do not get it.
It would be useful to support fragments and queries for local files.   These are lost when using a command like:

Indeed this does not work. It will only pull up the web browser but will not display the local file.html
As Marcus Johnson asked a month ago Is there a workaround or explantion?
This workflow worked until a few months ago. Can we get a reason why it no longer works or at best get a workaround?
